snippet: A court on Thursday convicted a human rights defender and her husband on fraud charges, prompting denunciations from rights groups.
abstract: Azerbaijan court convicts human rights defender Leyla Yunus and her husband Arif on fraud charges, prompting protests from rights groups; they are sentenced to prison terms.
lead_paragraph: A court on Thursday convicted a human rights defender and her husband on fraud charges, prompting denunciations from rights groups.

headline.main: Azerbaijan: Human Rights Defenders Are Sentenced
headline.print_headline: Europe; Azerbaijan: Human Rights Defenders Are Sentenced

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
